action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#script

base_url = "@@{infoblox_url}@@"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
hostname = "@@{calm_application_name}@@.@@{domain}@@"


def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
	if (payload != None):
		payload = json.dumps(payload)
	r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
	return r

headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}

### Reserve IP
reservation_payload = {}
reservation_payload['name'] = hostname
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = []
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = [{"ipv4addr":"func:nextavailableip:@@{network}@@"}]
payload = json.dumps(reservation_payload)
print "Payload: " + payload

url = base_url + "record:host";
r = process_request(url, 'POST', user, password, headers, reservation_payload)


###Get IP
data = r.json()
url = base_url + data;
r = process_request(url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
print r.status_code

ipref = r.json()
ip = ipref['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']

print "INFOBLOX_IP=", ip

action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#script

base_url = "@@{infoblox_url}@@"
user = "@@{infoblox.username}@@"
password = "@@{infoblox.secret}@@"
hostname = "@@{calm_application_name}@@.@@{domain}@@"


def process_request(url, method, user, password, headers, payload=None):
	if (payload != None):
		payload = json.dumps(payload)
	r = urlreq(url, verb=method, auth="BASIC", user=user, passwd=password, params=payload, verify=False, headers=headers)
	return r

headers = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'}

### Reserve IP
reservation_payload = {}
reservation_payload['name'] = hostname
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = []
reservation_payload['ipv4addrs'] = [{"ipv4addr":"func:nextavailableip:@@{network}@@"}]
payload = json.dumps(reservation_payload)
print "Payload: " + payload

url = base_url + "record:host";
r = process_request(url, 'POST', user, password, headers, reservation_payload)


###Get IP
data = r.json()
url = base_url + data;
r = process_request(url, 'GET', user, password, headers)
print r.status_code

ipref = r.json()
ip = ipref['ipv4addrs'][0]['ipv4addr']

print "INFOBLOX_IP=", ip
